website_summaries.verdict: These large desk pad calendars come with top holes for hanging on a wall.
pros: Lots of space for writing tasks
Other months listed below for quick reference on dates
Can be purchased in a multipack for lower price per calendar
Allows you to see an entire month easily for planning
cons: The calendar is designed to tear off each page after the month is over, making it hard to go back and track previous activity

customer_reviews.title: Good desk top calendar, I'd buy it again next year.
customer_reviews.text: There is plenty of room for writing and easy to use. I prefer to use it on the desk top, but I think it would work just as well hung on a wall or corkboard, just know that it might be a bit heavy for hanging so you'd want to use a good fastener.
customer_reviews.author: AL2NY

customer_reviews.title: Be Good at Ironing!
customer_reviews.text: The calendar is one we always buy--usually in store. Decided this time to order on line. Arrived, as usual, quickly. Opened package and found calendar totally wrinkled, caused by packaging. So I spent 20 minutes trying to iron the wrinkles out of the thing and finally got it flat enough to be usable, but the surface is still wrinkled and probably won't ever straighten out. And I have to live with it for a YEAR!!! ---------Not! :)
customer_reviews.author: H M WILLIAMSON

customer_reviews.title: Paper better than digital
customer_reviews.text: Calendar is indispensable for daily activities and recording them for archiving old-school in file boxes. A sort of diary. These At-A-Glance calendars have been my go-to for over a decade and are perfect for scheduling and recording events. My only issue is they've thinned the paper and using highlighters or felt pens bleeds through the pages to the month below, so one must put paper between the pages to prevent this. C'mon At-A-Glance, go back to proper weight paper!
customer_reviews.author: Cuffy

customer_reviews.title: Best Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar, I have been ordering these calendars for 3 years because they are so great. There is enough space to plan out my day/month/year and make general notes for the month. Perfect size for me and even when I mark on it with markers it doesn't bleed through on to the month after! Not to mention it's one of the cheapest calendars on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Sapier

customer_reviews.title: AT-A-GLANCE 2019 Desk Calendar, Desk Pad
customer_reviews.text: Very good reference tool for those with large desk areas who need to know what's up At a Glance. If you have a large desk area and need this info fast, this is the calendar for you. I have such a place and this tool is a very valuable aid for keeping track of engagements and things to do. I get one every year!! It's been six years now and they also help to track tax info, like doctor visits, and the like,
customer_reviews.author: Tina the S.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Exactly as Advertised and as shown.
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure if you buy one like thi, regardless which one you buy, that you get one that includes months you’re still currently in and going into as well as “next year”. This appeared to me to be the nicest of the options, and I am very pleased with it. I have only one wish - and I want to qualify this by saying that it really is NO slight on this product OR its manufacturer, because NOT ONE of the companies, including all of their competitors, offer this. I wish I could buy one that is about 6” larger corner to corner. My review here should be taken as an absolute recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H. Kann

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Great, Wished It Had Catholic Holy Days
customer_reviews.text: I love the blocks. They are huge and leave plenty of space to organize both my husband and my schedule. This is easily held up by Command hooks or nails. I've been using this calendar for years. My only gripe is that it has the Jewish and Muslim holidays, but lacks the Catholic holy days on it.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Large, plain, plenty of writing space for notes
customer_reviews.text: I buy one every year. I like size. Plenty of space to scrawl notes. It looks like complete Madness by months end.
customer_reviews.author: RAGE

customer_reviews.title: Archival
customer_reviews.text: I've been using At A Glance desk pad calendars for many many years and they are most useful and when change of month arrives the calendar page becomes an archive and journal of the month's activities for future reference.
customer_reviews.author: Cuffy

customer_reviews.title: I purchase every year
customer_reviews.text: We hang on pantry door so hubby can see, at a glance, what appts coming up for him.
customer_reviews.author: California Retiree

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Bent
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the product itself is a perfectly serviceable desk calendar - but not when it arrives bent and won't lay flat. What's really annoying is I've ordered 3 of them for 2019 from online retailers and EVERY SINGLE ONE has arrived bent because they are using very soft cardboard backing and sending them packaged in just a plastic sheeting envelope/mailer, not in a stiff container. I actually use these on my desk, so having them bent so they don't sit flat on a surface is hugely annoying. I was able to get a refund with no problem, which is the only reason for 2 stars, rather than 1.
customer_reviews.author: K Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have for the Busy Family
customer_reviews.text: This is the best calendar for a busy family. Plenty of room to note multiple appointments and extra space for notes. I don’t use it as a desk calendar but instead hang it with two heavy-duty magnetic clips to the fridge so everyone can see. Each person gets their own pen color to make it easier to see which activity is for whom. Durable quality. Perfect size. Corner flaps keeps paper nice and neat. A must have for each busy family.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time in 3 years that I have ordered a flat desk calendar and it did not come mangled or bent. Congratulations. Finally a responsible shipping. I thought I should probably buy this locally to avoid that problem. Glad I found this one. Good size, plenty of room to write notes.
customer_reviews.author: H. G.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Pros: • 12 small monthly calendars at the bottom of each page for quick reference. • Plenty of room in each date block for notes. I have been using this version for a few years. Last year I ordered a different (slightly cheaper) calendar that did not have the small monthly calendars at the bottom, and realized right away that I frequently use them. I ordered this one, and all was right with the world. The world at work anyway.
customer_reviews.author: SitaMoon

customer_reviews.title: Fire Dept Desk Calendars
customer_reviews.text: We love these calendars at the Fire Department. Squares are big enough to write in, easy to see at a glance what we need to keep track of, who's in, who's out and most importantly, when is payroll. It's just perfect - best calendar ever especially for writing on. And at a glance we can check out the prior month, or the month coming up at the bottom. We order these every year for the past 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Nina M BourBeau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk calendar!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new desk calendar! It's just the right size for a large desk and the calendar leaves plenty of space to make notations on each given day without going "out of the lines." It's sturdy, so I have no worries about it coming apart before the end of the next year. Really a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Pianoman

customer_reviews.title: Shipped & Packaged Well, Great Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and features. Lists TONS of HOlidays, and what day of the year it is in numbers and countdown. Like today is Jan 4th, so today is 4/361. Tons of room to write, and we use the calendar for everyone in the house. Helps a ton. This is our 2nd one, as the old one ran out of months, lol. We will be another one next year again.
customer_reviews.author: Exsomos

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother who works at a desk. She requested a large desk sized calendar and was very pleased with the size, the calendar presentation, and quality for price. We'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Amelio

customer_reviews.title: I buy this exact one each year
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these AT-A-GLANCE calendars for the past 5 years. During one of those years I bought a different brand and hated it so I ended up buying this AT-A-GLANCE one again. They provide just the right amount of space I need to write stuff down and the paper quality is decent that ink doesn't leak through.
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: Buy one every year
customer_reviews.text: Buy one every year. With most people using digital calendars it is common for people to become nostalgic when they see my analog calendar.....and they all say the same thing. "I should get one of those". Use this as my everyday calendar to manage my work schedule (meetings, deadlines, etc...).
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hollenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Basic calendar....has all of the dates.
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk calendar for the office...can also be hung on the wall (if you are some soccer mom). Usually enough to bring down a fully-grown elephant, this calendar has 6 lines per day...to jot down all your appointments and notes and such. You can't go wrong with this calendar....unless you follow the lunar calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Z.

customer_reviews.title: I'm as organized as those with fancy Iphones
customer_reviews.text: Don't make me defend my anti-tech tendencies. I like a paper calendar okay. This one is my favorite. I have one for work, and one for home. Every year. I didn't submit a packaging rating. (I honestly don't recall the packaging and feel that reviewing a package you can't even recall is in bad taste.)
customer_reviews.author: Tindle J Arnold

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Lots of space to write and very clear dates.
customer_reviews.author: alk

customer_reviews.title: Big daily calendar
customer_reviews.text: Great calendar, I buy one every year and hang it on the wall or use it on my desk. I love that it is a big calendar and has plenty of space to write things per day. In addition, I can go back and look up things nicely. The paper is durable and not too think to bleed through.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa F

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have ordered. I really like that each square has lines so I can keep each square legible with each separate activity I have written down.
customer_reviews.author: Summer D

customer_reviews.title: Helps my family stay organized
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar, I think I've had one every year for the past 3 years. It's large enough for each family member to have a line on it, with an extra for family gathering or misc events. The only thing I don't like about it is the cardboard backing, simply because I'm a big command strip user and when I've tried to use them on the calendar they tend to rip the cardboard off and it falls, so now I hang it with hooks, instead.
customer_reviews.author: thire

customer_reviews.title: A very helpful calendar
customer_reviews.text: This desk calendar is very helpful for keeping track of appointments. There are seven lines for each day. The size is great and the paper is high quality. Please note that the small calendars at the bottom of each pages shows the previous month, the current month (shaded) and the following ten months.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon Kane

customer_reviews.title: Lots oc room for multfamilh members appointments
customer_reviews.text: Paper a bit thin tears too easily Would prefer more space for notes / tasks for month Still a good deal for price
customer_reviews.author: Lem

customer_reviews.title: Buy them every year & hang on office wall
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of whimpy calendars with small spaces for notes. This is a huge wall calendar that I buy each year which should tell you something. It has big boxes for each month and lots of extra spaces for notes . Also has the other months below each month to show you a quick view for reference without having to turn the page. It can be used laying flat on your desk but I hang mine on the wall
customer_reviews.author: TheCommonMan

customer_reviews.title: Love the Calendar - Hate the price
customer_reviews.text: These desk calendars are great! The monthly sheets last way past the end of the month. Only issue is that if you jot down important notes, phone numbers, etc., you end up either leaving the monthly sheet until it is full or spend time transferring the important information. I would like to have a new calendar each year, but with the price and not having a need to flip the sheet each month, I pass on ordering a new one until I use the last one up and transfer all the phone numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Jabird 9

customer_reviews.title: Month Missing
customer_reviews.text: Bought yearly calendar for 2020 in November 2019. Arrived promptly. looked good and seemed OK. Today I was about to post calendar page for March 2020. I keep 2 calendars for two Months at a time posted on my fridge. Discovered that March was not in package! Silly me. I did not realize I was suppose to go through the entire yearly calendar upon arrival. I am 3 days past return date. Could not get "return message to seller" to show up on Amazon. I want the Month of March sent to me by seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Suerth

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the calendar as it is large enough to see my writing within. The lettering is in dark print which is the best thing for my eye site. I also like the Month written at the top and not the bottom. I would recommend the calendar to anyone, and I have done so. pm
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Fossil lover
customer_reviews.text: So just received & it’s for next year 2021 when I ordered 2020-2021. The back of calendar is broke/ ripped, the hard cardboard. I did contact seller & no reply. I seriously don’t know why I continue to purchase from amazon when 70% of the time something is either damaged or far from description.
customer_reviews.author: Fossil lover

customer_reviews.title: Another year, another calendar.
customer_reviews.text: I get one of these every year because it has enough room on the days for a visual schedule on paper. That way I have a way to track my overtime and all my appointments for the month. It also serves as a “home” calendar for my S.O. to observe when she needs to see my schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Rio P

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful Calendar
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is great for keeping track of family events, happenings, celebrations, etc. There is lots of room to write and it can be hung in a convenient spot so all of the family can see it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: What you See is What You Get
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for years. I hang it on the wall in the kitchen in plain sight for everyone to see. I use different color markers for different things. This particular calendar is as good as any from the major office stores and a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel Mertz

customer_reviews.title: The Calendar
customer_reviews.text: The calendar performed wonderfully. With just a quick glance I can tell the date. I get teary just thinking about it. It's kind of bigger than I wanted but I can handle it. If you need to see the date with just a quick glance, get this calendar. Its perfection.
customer_reviews.author: JustJules

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for your desk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a reminder at work, and it is PERFECT. I will definitely buy one for next year. This calendar reminds me of Holidays, and has enough room for me to write in anything I need. It is big enough to write in multiple items on one day, but not overwhelmingly large. I keep it right under the bottom lip of my keyboard so I can always see it. The small black corner pockets are a LIFESAVER, and the detailed 12 month breakdown at the bottom is very useful for me. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Klecha

customer_reviews.title: I buy one every year
customer_reviews.text: I believe I buy this exact calendar every year and it always works perfectly. It hasn’t let me down after almost a decade! Nice space for notes and appointments and helps keep me organized. I have an online calendar but it helps me stay organized when I am on the phone or multitasking at work or need to refer to a specific day on the phone. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Original Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Great. Love that it comes as a 3 pack.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using At a Glance large calendars for the last four years or so and no complaints. Along with Pocket Life app on my IPad, I am able to get a good handle on my (business & personal) busy schedule and busy days. The three pack allows me to give one to my dad and the other to Baby Pickles for his busy puppy schedule. I will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: StinkyPuppieReviews!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see each day, since it has multiple lines for each date
customer_reviews.text: This desk calendar is the perfect size to keep appt dates. For each date, there are enough lines for several events. The dates are easy to see. The calendar is sturdy. I like how the edges are surrounded by cardboard. It is affordable. I will be ordering one next year
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine C. Roys

customer_reviews.title: Having a hard copy is always a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Have a Calendar on my desktop computer. There’s also one on my smart phone. But one of these I find a necessity. Having a hard copy isn’t a bad idea. Seems like whenever I make entries in pen I encounter a cancellation. so, all my notations go down in pencil
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Potter

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good price for 3 desk calendars. We use these in a commercial setting and they last the year thru. One hangs on a wall and is constantly taken down to be written on and they still hold up just fine. Would recommend if you need a calendar like this.
customer_reviews.author: AverageDad

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is thrilled with his and loves the fact that it came right to our front door. In past years, he's run around to all of the office stores looking for this type of calendar. He said that the price for this calendar is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: cherylny

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: If you are a busy family and like somewhere other than your ipad to write everything down. This is great. I have gotten this same brand/style calendar for over 5 years now and works wonderful for us. Like the moon and holiday information. There is enough room to write down several events in one day. Hangs nicely on the wall with command hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Love this calendar
customer_reviews.text: Product arrives flat in a large box. Lots of room to write appointments and events in the daily block. Perfect desktop or countertop calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Barb M

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in Poor Condition
customer_reviews.text: This came in a flat box, but it was all bent in the middle. I can't send back because I need it now. Not happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: B4

customer_reviews.title: Love these calendars
customer_reviews.text: I buy one of these calendars every year to hang up on the wall and keep all of our family's schedule on! It is the perfect size for all of our appts, meetings, practices, etc. I definitely suggest it! It shipped and I received it very quickly, too!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey West

customer_reviews.title: I do everything else on a computer, but still love a paper calendar on the wall.
customer_reviews.text: Buy it every year. good to go. Good price, well made, lots of room to write things you have to do on certain days. And tells you how many days left in the year. I do everything else on a computer, but still love a paper calendar on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Master of Cats

customer_reviews.title: I get this every year, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I get this calendar every year and it goes on my pantry door! My family loves that they can see what the schedule is and I love that they don’t have to constantly ask me when things are. Keeps my husband and I on the same page for things!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Much easier than trying to find one at Office Max
customer_reviews.text: I swear that everything I walk into Office Max to get a desk pad calendar, they are out of the inexpensive brand and I have to pay $25 for 12 sheets of paper. Now that I've found these on Amazon I can kiss that problem goodbye. Good quality and I can replace it cheaply when I spill coffee on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk calendar
customer_reviews.text: I have bought one of these every year for the past 7 years. Keeps me organized and easy to read large spots for penning in appointments or things to do. I highly recommend this calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Does the job - wish it had wall mount holes
customer_reviews.text: We hang this on the wall so the whole family can see it and enter dates. It’s designed for a desk so there are no mounting holes so we hang it with duct tape. I wish it had a couple of holes on the top to make it wall mountable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hanson

customer_reviews.title: All the numbers are in sequence and on the correct days.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a calendar? It has the usual 12 month format and no roman numerals. All the weeks have seven days, etc. Before these came along we wrote stuff on the walls in random order. Artsey-Fartsey but useless.
customer_reviews.author: Yabbah DaBadeux

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but price seems kinda high
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it is a calender and you write stuff on it. It seem fine for my office desk. Price is kinda steep for it though, especially since I usually get them for free companies that use calenders to advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Not following special instructions
customer_reviews.text: Love Amazon could not live without them! But the only thing is that I put in the special instructions part to at least ring my doorbell when orders arrive so if I am home I can immediately restive them them! I put this on every order and it has not happened yet!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Horigan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Desk Calendar!
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar for many reasons. It is the perfect size, date boxes are large enough to enter events, it’s easy to see all months, and there is a place to jot down notes. Amazon price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackpot

customer_reviews.title: Good calendar
customer_reviews.text: I like this calendar because of the months at the bottom. So much more convenient than at the top
customer_reviews.author: Mickey68

customer_reviews.title: 2020 calendar to remember
customer_reviews.text: If I had known that I would need a desk calendar this little in 2020, I would probably have kept the one with December 2019 on. But hey, live and learn. Keyword being "live".
customer_reviews.author: tp

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for any desk!
customer_reviews.text: At our office we love these desktop calendars. They have lines on each day for notes. Notes lines on the top of the month. And past and future months at the bottom. Pen ink does not bleed through to the next page. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic useful calendar
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these calendars for years. I like the lines & easy-to-read text & numbers. I appreciated the minimal packaging this year.
customer_reviews.author: NWS

customer_reviews.title: Depressed at work?
customer_reviews.text: This won't fix it. but it will however, put a stop to risking looking up and possibly making eye contact with that crazy lady that has a few too many cats and is dying to have a conversation with an actual person. You know who I'm talking about. You're Welcome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Films let and cheap look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and cheap. Doesn't look or feel like a typical at a glance product. Would not have purchased at any price let alone the $12.45 I paid for this at Amazon. Will be returning on principle.
customer_reviews.author: northeast

customer_reviews.title: SHIPPING review!
customer_reviews.text: The calendar is great! Just as described. However, it is not a good item to purchase online, as it was bent and the pages are creased. The calendar does NOT look clean or neat...it’s the shipping that needs improvement-not the item..
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Alanis

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Clear easy to read. Like having the entire year in monthly sections at the bottom of the major month over at the top as I tend to cover up the top have of the calendar with paper.
customer_reviews.author: VJS

customer_reviews.title: Good Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I like these calendars a lot, I like to be able to see my whole month for my work scheduling. However I do wish they still sold the 24 packs as I would purchase these for several of my coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: It was just as good in person than whenIi oefered it.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my desk not too small & not too big. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: pattilou

customer_reviews.title: Just right for elders
customer_reviews.text: Clear and no nonsense, a calendar that works the old fashioned way
customer_reviews.author: charlene ann james

customer_reviews.title: Good calendar with a lot of space to document.  Good price, too.
customer_reviews.text: Good calendar with a lot of space to document activities and an excellent price. I have order 2 more calendars for the next two years.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Collier, MsPsy

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one last year for my desk, and it worked great. Lots of room to write down information. Easy to see and just the right size. Already Ordered and received nexts years.
customer_reviews.author: NoNo

customer_reviews.title: Good but can get cheaper elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for home office. Have had them in the past and they work for my use but saw that Walmart stocks them for less than half. I will remember this for next year
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep you organized
customer_reviews.text: It is simply the best calendar for your desk. I have two of them; one in my office and one in my home office. Lots of room to write each day and room around the calendar to add miscellaneous info. Looking forward to using the 2021 calendar soon.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: I see you, 2020!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic edges are coming off and I haven’t even unwrapped it yet. No worries, though. I bought it to be a calendar and that’s what it is. Large and in charge.
customer_reviews.author: RiverBears

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used to be one of my most used things in my house before the Rona. But hopefully will buy again to use and WRITE ON my PLANS for 2021 :(
customer_reviews.author: Darrian

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Desk calendar
customer_reviews.text: Basic calendar, no extra dates (filling in the squares), a little smaller than some extra large ones I've had, this is a better fit for a desk. Best desk calendar!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Size and writing space
customer_reviews.text: Liked the overall size---plenty of room to write notes. Corner 'keep-down' tabs could be a little stronger. But overall, an excellent desk calendar.
customer_reviews.author: El Hombre

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this calendar. If you like going old school and using real paper to manage your months, I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Yearly calendar organizer
customer_reviews.text: You can add alot on this calendat without effort.Theres plenty of space for you to put anything you might need to write during the day week or month
customer_reviews.author: Jake gibson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product
customer_reviews.text: I buy it ever year. It last all year, durable. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's big enough to put sticky note in date box and write. I bought this beginning of this year and I like it. It's worth to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Aya A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I buy this desk calendar every year and i'm never disappointed. it's sturdy, the boxes are big to write in and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne scavuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to get my 2019 desk calendar at a nearby store. Sadly, it was listed at about twice the amount that I could find it on Amazon. No color, just ruled blocks, black on white. A lot of money for simple and adequate...I was sure it was a misprint. Purchased it here and happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying year after year
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. This calendar is fantastic for my office needs. I enjoy the calendars with scenery on them but for the cost, you cannot beat this one.
customer_reviews.author: jeffery a ransom

customer_reviews.title: Large, useful, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy with large area to write in. We use this on the wall and it is a perfect size. Easy to write on, easy to see and easy to look ahead.
customer_reviews.author: parrottgirl

customer_reviews.title: 2019 At a glance Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Use it as a wall calendar for all important things. very handy and with the ruled blocks, easy to write stuff with more lines to add things to. it got a bit more expensive than last year, but a lot less than other places.
customer_reviews.author: Kaji58

customer_reviews.title: The Best Desk Calander you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Made the mistake of buying a cheaper one, it was pathetic1 I went back to AT-A-GLANCE calendar and it works great for keeping me organized!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wieczorek

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Stated in Ad
customer_reviews.text: This desk pad has eliminated, for the most part, my looking around for writing dates or notes down concerning appts, meetings etc.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L Mills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hanging and Writing Notes
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size calendar for hanging and writing notes...a great visual hardcopy backup to our digital phone calendar. We get this one every year
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this calender. I really LOVE that it is lined to help keep everything organized. Great durable pages and quality. Does not tear like some when you are flipping pages to add in other months. Highly reccomended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good perforations
customer_reviews.text: Makes an excellent desk pad. Plenty of space to write notes. Good perforations for tearing away monthly sheets.
customer_reviews.author: WilW

customer_reviews.title: Love these-perfect amount of space
customer_reviews.text: Love this-by each year but disappointed how it came. Corners wrinkles, the back part at the top was bent but usable. Just annoying
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great organizational help
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer this calendar without lines but love the cheap price and size. I keep it on my fridge with all the activities for our family of 5. It's a fantastic help for keeping my family organized and aware of what we have going on.
customer_reviews.author: turtley78

customer_reviews.title: Best desk calendar for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a wall calendar. ( Keep kids activities planned ) The holes are a standard width and I hang a new one on permanent hooks every year. You can write with a sharpie and it won't bleed through.
customer_reviews.author: JGS

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Great basic desktop calendar nothing too fancy. Exactly what I thought it would be. Wish there was a protective lining at the edge to prevent the pages from flipping up
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Important
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep track of important appointments such as doctor's appointment. I am able to list more than one appointment for each day
customer_reviews.author: Karen Green-Berry

customer_reviews.title: We buy this every year
customer_reviews.text: Every year we buy this exact same format. We love it!!!! It hangs on the side of our Frig so it’s visible to the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Ramzey

customer_reviews.title: excellent product which i've used for years
customer_reviews.text: Used to pay twice the $ for a 'day-timer' type product until i ran across this pad. Works equally well for about half the price. if you are looking for a desk pad calendar it's difficult to go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: No stupid frills
customer_reviews.text: It is a basic, functional desk calendar. I like that it doesn't waste space with extra printing or pictures that you don't need.
customer_reviews.author: T Mat

customer_reviews.title: Good value desk top calendar
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast shipping on amazon. Fits my desk top perfectly with enough room to write all of my schedule and events.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: This calendar I can hang on the wall or leave it on my desk. I like the big size, I can write on the dates for appts.
customer_reviews.author: Add

product_meta.title: AT-A-GLANCE 2019 Desk Calendar, Desk Pad, 21-3/4" x 17", Standard, Ruled Blocks (SK2400)
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1| Style:2019 Old EditionKeep track of important deadlines, special events and more with clear organization and professional style. The AT-A-GLANCE Desk Pad covers 12 months, January 2019-December 2019. Julian dates included. Plan your schedule without fear of distracting ink bleeding. Our improved, high-quality paper is designed for superior ink bleed resistance, which keeps plans neat and legible. Great for long-term planning, each month features ruled daily blocks for neat scheduling, a full year of reference calendars and a notetaking space. Pages measure 21-3/4" x 17". Place your schedule where you can easily view it every day. The desk pad has a black headband with eyelets for optional wall hanging, which helps improve visibility. Comes with 24 desk pads.
feature_bullets: YEAR-ROUND PLANNING – Desk calendar covers 12 months, January 2019-December 2019. Julian dates included. Keep track of deadlines, special events and more with clear organization and professional style
INK BLEED RESISTANCE – Plan your schedule without fear of distracting ink bleeding. Our improved, high-quality paper is designed for superior ink bleed resistance, which keeps plans neat and legible
MONTHLY VIEWS – Great for long-term planning, each month features ruled daily blocks for neat scheduling, a full year of reference calendars and a notetaking space. Pages measure 21-3/4" x 17"
VERSATILE PLACEMENT – Place your schedule where you can easily view it. Desk pad has a black headband with eyelets for optional wall hanging, which improves visibility. Comes with 24 desk pads
